statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (9,-3) and (5,-6).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

solution.p: \displaystyle\frac{{-{6}-{\left(-{3}\right)}}}{{{5}-{\left({9}\right)}}}=-\frac{{3}}{{-{{4}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{3}}{{4}} (if it's not already reduced)
